overview: Is your company conducting Research and Development (R&D) in Canada? If so, did you know you can get back a significant portion of your R&D expenses as a tax refund or credit through Revenue Canada’s Scientific Research and Experimental Development (SR&ED) program? The SRED program is a great way to stretch your R&D dollars, boost your innovation efforts, and help your company become a commercial success! If you haven’t taken advantage of the SR&ED program then you can learn how at SRED-iQ.net.
